title: We need harder punishments for afks
body: My idea would be If you lose a game where someone has been afk for 5+ minutes they lose all the lp their team would have lost and their teammates lose none. I think this would stop people from just rage afking because of the massive loss and would spare the rage of teammates because no lp loss. Yet it's still a light enough punishment where if you get an internet crash, emergency, late for something etc you wouldn't feel too bad, thoughts?

replies.body: That's too much. If someone is afk, then they should only lose the lp, yes. But it's not like that. Having them lose about 80+ lp because of an afk is a bit too much. It's not fair at all. Some people have things to do. Rage quitting is sad, yes. But it happens. You have to realize that. You can't stop it, and neither can riot. That's like saying "Hey, how about you afk if we get snowbally enough, that way if we lose then nobody loses lp other than you" and people would end up building accounts just for that free boost and the off chance of losing no lp.

No expiration date and so far it hasn't come down from 20 minutes. I can't imagine being a non-support main and waiting that long to get in. I know it's not quite the justice you want carried out, but it still sucks...
